verses.roman:
'jagannātha-vallabha' nāma baḍā puṣpārāma
nava dina karena prabhu tathāi viśrāma

synonyms: jagannātha-vallabha—Jagannātha-vallabha; nāma—named; baḍa—very big; puṣpa-ārāma—garden; nava dina—nine days; karena—does; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tathāi—there; viśrāma—resting.
translation: The garden of His pastimes was very large and was named Jagannātha vallabha. Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu took his rest there for nine days.
